dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 60 PCS: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the National Park Service relating to “Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Motor Vehicles”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the National Park Service relating to Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Motor Vehicles.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the National Park Service of the Department of the Interior relating to Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Motor Vehicles (90 Fed. Reg. 2621), and such rule shall have no force or effect.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives April 29, 2025.

endorsement.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar
